name: Wacky Chariots
description:
Wacky Chariots is a racing game set in the fantasy world which is inspired mainly by ancient Rome and Greece. Compete on different tracks with up to 5 AI or human players or drive alone and try to complete some of the various challenges.
Begin your journey to become the ultimate champion by mastering chariot controls and raising your rank.

Eternal glory awaits you!

Current Features:
- 4 game modes
- 9 available charioteers
- Split screen
- Customizable chariots with variety of options

Planned Features:
- 4 more game modes
- More Charioteers
- Short singleplayer campaigns
- Online matchmaking
- More customization options

Game is still in development and more features are coming!
